name: Angewomon
effect: [When Digivolving] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gains ＜Security Attack -2＞ (This Digimon checks 2 fewer security cards) until the end of your opponent's next turn.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking] If you have 3 or fewer security cards, you may play 1 yellow level 3 Digimon card from your hand without paying its memory cost.
